name: blue-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Beauty during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Beauty while in a contest.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Beauty aspect of the Pokémon holding it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Beauty aspect of the Pokémon holding it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Beauty aspect of the Pokémon holding it.
